Gather.Say: Please press the button corresponding to the type doctor you would like to see. To see a dermatologist, press 1. To see an orthopedic, press 2. To see a chiropractor, press 3. To see a cardiologist, press 4. To see a psychiatrist, press 5. To see an endocrinologist, press 6. To see a pediatrician, press 7. To see a general doctor, press 8.

Response.Say: Sorry, I didn't get your response.
